meanings.sent1: The semiweekly trash collection helps keep the neighborhood clean.
meanings.sent2: My favorite show has a semiweekly schedule, airing every Wednesday and Friday.
meanings.sent3: I look forward to the semiweekly visits from my grandparents; they always bring treats.
meanings.sent4: The semiweekly meetings with my study group are like clockwork, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The semiweekly sunrise yoga classes energize me for the day ahead.

meanings.definition: A publication that is issued twice a week.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the semiweekly newspaper for updates on local events.
meanings.sent2: The semiweekly magazine covers a wide range of topics for its readers.
meanings.sent3: The semiweekly comic strip always leaves me eagerly waiting for the next issue.
meanings.sent4: The semiweekly newsletter from the club keeps members informed and engaged.
meanings.sent5: The semiweekly journal publication showcases new research findings regularly.
